Moo::TextureStage

Moo::TextureStage Class Reference

This class implements a utility wrapper for the direct3D texture stage concept. More...

Detailed Description

This class implements a utility wrapper for the direct3D texture stage concept.

TextureStage objects are most commonly used in conjunction with Moo::Material objects.
